original_text: Some time ago Theudas appeared, claiming to be somebody, and about four hundred men rallied to him. He was killed, all his followers were dispersed, and it all came to nothing.
korean_text: 이전에 드다가 일어나 스스로 선전하매 사람이 약 사백 명이나 따르더니 그가 죽임을 당하매 따르던 모든 사람들이 흩어져 없어졌고

sentences.original_text: and about four hundred men rallied to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 약 사백 명의 사람들이 그에게 모여들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it all came to nothing
